Title: New graphs for monitoring LLM usage
introduction:
Weâ€™ve just released new graphs to help you track your LLM usage more easily: 
- Average prompt tokens  
- Average completion tokens  
- Average tokens  
- Max tokens per minute  

These new graphs make it easier to spot trends, optimize performance, and manage costs. 

 Check them out and get a deeper understanding of your LLM activity!

New.description: Added GPT-4o Search Preview and GPT-4o Mini Search Preview.

Improved.description: Improved the filter save feature in Logs.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where new lines were not saved in prompt templates.
